title: how to join chat room in new client (2016)
body: how to join chat room in new client?

replies.body: I don't believe this option is available yet in the updated client.  I have no eta on when that would be enabled, but bookmark our [client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) for update on that or if you want to share any feedback.  Let me know if you have any questions!

didnt you get the problem?

or are chat rooms in new client available in NA now?^^
here in euw they are not..im only using the old client for my beloved aram channel..
